# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-14.0, -51.0)
Consists of following entities

### Iron plate storage at position (4.5, -58.5)
Consists of following entities
- Chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Drill output blocked
- The burner mining drill at x=-14.0 y=-51.0 is frequently blocked. Ensure proper belt placement and sufficient transport capacity to prevent output blockage.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- The inserter at x=5.5 y=-59.5 is frequently waiting for source items. Ensure that the chest at x=4.5 y=-58.5 has enough items.

### Inserter facing the wrong direction
- The inserter at x=5.5 y=-59.5 was initially facing the wrong direction. Ensure that inserters are placed facing the correct direction when they are placed.
